contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|bus stop}} A '''[[bus stop]]''' is a place, other than a terminal, established for buses to pick up and drop off passengers '''Bus Stop''' may also refer to: *[[Bus Stop (play)|''Bus Stop'' (play)]], a 1955 play by William Inge *[[Bus Stop (film)|''Bus Stop'' (film)]], a 1956 film, loosely based on the play, with Marilyn Monroe and Don Murray *[[Bus Stop (2012 film)|''Bus Stop'' (2012 film)]], a Telugu film directed by Maruthi *[[Bus Stop (TV series)|''Bus Stop'' (TV series)]], a 1961-62 television series *[[Bus Stop (1982 film)|''Bus Stop'' (1982 film)]], the 1982 retelling of the original 1955 play starring [[Tim Matheson]] === Music === *[[Bus Stop (band)]], a 1998 band known for a version of "Kung Fu Fighting" *[[Bus Stop (song)|"Bus Stop" (song)]], a 1966 single by The Hollies *"[[The Bus Stop Song]]", a 1956 single by The Four Lads, used as the intro song for the 1956 film ''Bus Stop'' *"(Are You Ready) Do The Bus Stop", a 1975 single by [[Fatback Band]] *[[Bus Stop (album)|''Bus Stop'' (album)]], a 1966 album by The Hollies {{disambiguation}}
